## Introduction {.small}

-   Social media platforms are deeply embedded in students’ daily routines

-   Double-edged role:

    - <span style="font-size: 0.9em;">Support connection and self-expression</span> 
    - <span style="font-size: 0.9em;">Displace essential habits like sleep and study</span>

-   Authorities and researchers have raised concerns about social media in mental health issues^[The Guardian. (2023). *Instagram lawsuit: Meta sued by dozens of US states over impact on youth mental health*. *The Guardian*.]
